item.ptxt: This is the TOYOTA INNOVA New Car Features. To assist you in your service activities, this manual explains the main characteristics in particular providing a technical explanation of the construction and operation of new mechanism and new technology used.
This manual applies to the models listed below. It covers all information in the previously issued Pub. No. NM21Q2EV, and includes all production changes effective March, 2015 or later.
Please note that the publications below have also been prepared as relevant service manuals for the components and system in these vehicles.
All information in this manual is based on the latest product information at the time of publication. However, specifications are subject to change without notice.
If you find any failures in this manual, you are kindly requested to inform us by using the report form on the next page.
